Implemented_Security_Controls.Access_Control: Owner-only functions (withdraw and Command) restrict access to the contract owner.
Implemented_Security_Controls.Low-Level_Call_Warning: Command function utilizes adr.call.value(msg.value)(data) without any success validation, creating potential security vulnerabilities.

Fallback_Functionality: A fallback function exists to allow the contract to accept Ether payments without any additional logic.
